jcr:content.jcr:description: Discover a whole new you with smooth, refreshed and resurfaced skin with Definisse™ Peel program. Softer to the touch, brighter, lighter and visibly smoother.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Definisse™ Peel Program

title_copy_copy_copy.jcr:title: Peel back the years with a 3 step perfecting treatment that’s kinder to your skin

text.text:
Hormonal, environmental and physical factors can mark our skin, seemingly permanently, but it doesn’t need to be. 

Discover a whole new you with smooth, refreshed and resurfaced skin with Definisse™ Peel program. Softer to the touch, brighter, lighter and visibly smoother - reveal a glowing complexion without imperfections, unwanted pigmentation or fine lines.

text_copy_copy.text: Mechanical and chemical peels are professionally administered exfoliations of the skin - which reveal lower layers of the skin and encourage regeneration of fresh unmarked skin.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What is the Definisse™ Peel program good for?

text_copy_copy.text:
Definisse™ Peel program features a classic peel and a lightening peel created to address hyperpigmentation - like sun spots.

Treatments using the Definisse™ Classic Peel can reduce sun damage, superficial wrinkles and post-acne scarring. They are also effective in combating superficial scars as well as stretch marks. 

 

Definisse™ Lightening Peel tackles several forms of hyperpigmentation induced by different causes, for example environmental or hormonal (such as a consequence of pregnancy or taking oral contraceptives).

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: What is the Definisse™ Peel program treatment like?

text_copy_copy.text:
Definisse™ Peel program is a 3 step process administered by aesthetic professionals. 

 

The first step is a ‘pre-peel’, differentiated for dry or oily skin types. This cleanses the skin and evens out PH levels, preparing skin for a safe and optimised treatment. 

 

Next is the either Definisse™ Classic Peel or Definisse™ Lightening Peel treatment depending on your individual complexion needs. The peel will gently be applied to your skin in all the areas needed. The peel remains on for a few minutes, then is gently sponged off. 

 

Last but not least, Definisse™ Neutralising Buffer is applied and delicately neutralises the acids in the peels and restores PH balance. Calmly concluding your skins ‘rebirth’.

 

The process may cause a little tingling and you may experience some redness directly after the treatment, but it is minimal, short-lived and easily soothed.

item_1723188303459.cq:panelTitle: How does the Definisse™ Peel program work?

text_copy_copy.text:
The active component of the treatment - the peels - harnesses the rejuvenating properties of three types of mild acid. Definisse™ Classic Peel uses a combination of mild levels of Salicylic acid, Pyruvic acid and Retinoic acid. Each works with a different layer of the skin.

 

The effect of Salicylic acid breaks down the tired and damaged outer layers of skin.8,9 Pyruvic acid brings antimicrobial benefits and sebum regulation, stimulates collagen and elastin generation and can also have a lightening effect.8,9,10 The Retinoic acid stimulates increased skin cell turn-over at the lower layers of skin.8,9

 

The cumulative effect is immediate and ongoing regeneration of cells and the skin surface - giving you a fresh faced look you haven’t seen in years!

title.jcr:title: A gentle treatment with multiple benefits for your skin

text.text:
Definisse™ Peel program uses a combination of active ingredients with unique benefits that work together to achieve faster regeneration of the skin. The use of less of each individual ingredient results in a gentler treatment.


Ask for Definisse™ Peel Program for beautiful, youthful skin

title_1111695653.jcr:title: A complete tool kit for skin renewal

text_1553609734.text: For thin, dry and sensitive skin. It cleanses the skin gently and evens out skin’s pH

text_1553609734_copy.text: For combination-oily and acne-prone skin. It cleanses the skin with a degreasing effect and evens out skin’s pH

In cases of:

Photo-ageing; superficial wrinkles or expression lines; post-acne skin imperfections; superficial scars; seborrhoeic skin; stretch marks

text_1553609734_copy_1332663134.text:
In cases of:

Localised hypermelanosis; melasma (chloasma) from pregnancy or contraceptives; melanotic pigmentation; marks caused by photo-ageing

text_1553609734_copy.text: This step effectively but delicately neutralises acids that remain on the skin after a peel, rebalancing the skin’s pH

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: How can I get rid of acne scars

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ peel program works on multiple layers of the skin. The active ingredient Salicylic acid breaks down the tired and damaged outer layers of skin.8,9 This can remove the very top layers that are marked and stimulate new, fresh unmarked skin.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: How can I get rid of forehead wrinkles

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ peel program contains mild levels of Pyruvic acid - which stimulates collagen and elastin generation - and so works in tandem with Salicylic acid to not only break down the top layers of skin, but to promote plumping and therefore reduction of wrinkles.8,9,10

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: How can I get rid of stretch marks

text_copy_copy.text: Definisse™ peel program works on deeper levels of the skin that many topical treatments. The active ingredient Retinoic acid stimulates increased skin cell turn-over at the lower layers of skin8,9 and is therefore able to reduce marks of a more intrinsic nature, such as scarring and stretch marks.

title_1657927442_cop.jcr:title: Definisse™3D lift threads can be combined with other Definisse™ products, to achieve the best possible results in holistic rejuvenation, for optimal well being.

title.jcr:title: Be ready for every event in life

text.text:
Enjoy the confidence of alluring defined cheeks and elegant poise by combining both lifting and volumising techniques. 

Working together to deliver a seamless and natural result; Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads give your cheeks support by repositioning skin that has begun to sag with gravity, whilst Definisse™ Filler restores hydration, density and volume to the cheekbone area, replacing volume that has diminished overtime. 

The result is a refreshed demeanour, defined features and a younger outlook.

text_copy_copy.text:
Hold your head up high with a taught, crisp jawline - eliminating jowling and sagging skin.

You might have thought that was a thing of the past, but with Definisse™ Eleva, it can be possible again. 

The upper jaw area is redefined and volumised with strategic placement of Definisse™ Fillers. Then Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads lift the weight of time from your jawline to reinstate a youthful contour and silhouette. Taking years off & renewing your sense of self.

text_copy_copy_copy.text:
Nothing is more ageing than looking tired all the time - and can even make you feel tired. 

The combination of techniques in DefinisseTM Illumina present the miracle cure you’ve been wishing for. Eyes appear awakened, brighter, more alert and with a renewed sparkle.

The eyebrow arch is enhanced with subtle use of Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads to lift the tissues of the forehead that have succumbed to the passage of time, instantly refreshing your look.

Specially formulated Definisse™ Filler is then gently applied to the tear trough area to correct the loss of volume that causes dark circles. Finally Definisse™ Filler completes the rejuvenation by lifting the cheekbone contour and reducing wrinkles to the side of the eye.

This subtle and discrete use of advanced aesthetics technology makes a real difference to how you look and feel

text_copy_copy_copy_.text:
As we age, volume and definition can diminish in the features that make up our profile. Cumulatively it can change our appearance and make us feel less like ‘ourselves’. 

Refresh your profile with a clever combination of Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads and Definisse™ Filler - Definisse™ Musa.

Definisse™ 3D Lift Threads are used to gently lift the tip of the nose, creating completely natural and subtle rejuvenation without distorting its shape. 

Definisse™ Filler is then used to enhance the lip volume, the lip contour and the chin, returning the lower face to its prior fullness and beauty. Lips are plumped yet naturally, so as to affirm your natural proportions and most attractive features.

text.text:
8 Cavallini M Le iperpigmentazioni cutanee: proposta di trattamento con peeling chimico combinato e schiarente topico locale. L’ambulatorio Medico 2010, 29: 5-6 

9 Celleno L. “Dermatologia Cosmetologica”; 352-356; 2008 

10 Truchuelo M, Cerdá P, Fernández LF. Chemical Peeling: A Useful Tool in the Office. Actas Dermosifiliogr. 2017;108:315-322.
